summary: DOD uses satellite-based GPS for critical operations with its aircraft, ships, munitions, land vehicles, and ground troops. DOD is developing positioning, navigation, and timing technology to complement GPS or as an alternative when GPS is unavailable. We looked at challenges DOD faces in developing and fielding these new technologies, and identified policy options to help address them. For example, the level of precision that GPS...
title: Defense Navigation Capabilities: DOD is Developing Positioning, Navigation, and Timing Technologies to Complement GPS
